meaning_str.bing:
n. 星期四
网络. 周四；日星期四；礼拜四

1.en: But Elop said on Thursday that Nokia's final assessment was that "we would not be able to differentiate enough" on Android's platform.
1.cn: 但是，埃洛普周四表示，诺基亚最终得出的结论是，采用Android平台，“将无法有效地保证诺基亚产品的独特性”。

2.en: She said that on Thursday afternoon, after the U. S. State Department statement, she received more than 10 requests in two hours.
2.cn: 她说，周四下午，在美国国务院发布声明后，她两个小时即收到10余次请求。

3.en: Dell Inc is getting a marketing makeover, trying to shed its image as a cheaper alternative to rivals, Reuters reported Thursday.
3.cn: 据路透社21日报道，全球第二大个人电脑制造商戴尔公司正在进行一场营销策略大调整，试图摆脱其作为竞争对手廉价替代品的形象。

0.en: So I gotta get in there by Thursday. Okay? Just remember Thursday. Thursday. Can you remember Thursday? Yeah so, Tuesday?
0.cn: 我星期四之前得过去，记得星期四就对了，你记得吗？星期二吗？

1.en: No, thank you. I'm not eating pizza tonight. But it's Thursday. Thursday's pizza night.
1.cn: 不了，谢谢，我今晚不吃披萨。可今天是星期四，星期四是披萨之夜。

2.en: Yes, but we all agreed that the third Thursday at every month would be anything can happen Thursday.
2.cn: 对，但我们说过每月第三个星期四是一切皆有可能的星期四。

3.en: But tonight's Thursday. On Thursdays, everybody comes over here and has pizza.
3.cn: 可今天是星期四啊，每个星期四大家都会过来一起吃披萨。

4.en: Oh, yes. Our relationship agreement specifies that the second Thursday of every month, or the third Thursday in a month with five Thursdays, is date night.
4.cn: 是的，我们的恋爱协议明确规定了每个月的第二个星期四，如一个月有五个周四，则第三个星期四，便是约会之夜。

5.en: I was pretty close with my dad. And he died when I was 17, on a Tuesday. And we didn't have any savings. So I got a haircut that Thursday and a job the same Thursday.
5.cn: 我跟我的父亲很亲。他去世时，我17才岁。周二，和我们没有任何积蓄。于是我剪了头发 星期四找了工作...同样在星期四。

6.en: But would it be possible for him to get an audition for your movie say on Thursday?
6.cn: 但你可不可能让他去试镜，就星期四吧？

7.en: All right. Thanks. You're the best. Now listen, the last day of auditions is Thursday. Okay?
7.cn: 谢了，你最好了，试镜是星期四截止。

8.en: Thursday. Look if you need help remembering think of like this, the third day. All right?
8.cn: 是星期四，你如果记不住就记是第三天。

9.en: Oh, you're right. It's anything can happen Thursday let's hit the club and meet hot women.
9.cn: 你说得对，今天是一切皆有可能的星期四，大家去酒吧美眉。

10.en: Last night was Wednesday. Wednesday is comic book night tonight we will be going on Thursday because it is Anything Can Happen Thursday.
10.cn: 昨天是星期三，星期三是漫画之夜，今天去就是周四去啦，因为今天是一切皆有可能的星期四。

11.en: Rut? I think you mean consistency. And if we're going to abandon that, then why even call it Thursday?
11.cn: 刻板？你是说连贯性吧，如果要废除这个那干嘛要叫它星期四？

12.en: Come on, the whole idea hehind anything can happen Thursday is to get out this rut we've been in lately.
12.cn: 拜托，一切皆有可能的星期四它的含义是摆脱近期的刻板生活。

13.en: Well, apparently that you didn't reach my digestive system which when startle has its own version on anything can happen Thursday.
13.cn: 显然没有满足我的消化系统要求，在一切皆有可能的星期四也有自己的要求。

14.en: Monday, one day. Tuesday, two day. Wednesday, when? What day? Thursday. The third day. Okay? Thank you. Okay.
14.cn: 星期一，一天，星期二，二天，星期三，三天？ 哪一天？星期四，第三天，好吗？谢谢你。不客气。

15.en: Daddy Pig doesn't work on Saturdays. Daddy Pig, you'll be late for work. But it is Saturday, Mummy Pig, isn't it? No. It's Thursday.
15.cn: 猪爸爸星期六是不上班的。猪爸爸，你上班要迟到了！但是今天是星期六啊，猪妈妈，难道不是？不是啊。今天是星期四！

16.en: Understood, detective. Okay, let's see if I got this right. One: after a group study session, Margot, with her car, didn't return home Thursday evening.
16.cn: 明白了，警探。好的，你来听听我说的对不对。一：一次学习小组学习后，玛戈还有她的车在星期四晚上都失踪了。

17.en: So, Leonard, how are you enjoying anything can happen Thursday?
17.cn: 莱纳德，你现在对"周四夜惊喜"怎么看？

18.en: And what about Thursday night? Thursday night, I was finishing up my final paper for English.
18.cn: 那礼拜四晚上你都在做什么？礼拜四晚上，我在写我英文课的期末论文。

19.en: Problem? This is Thai food. Here we go. We don't have Thai food on Thursday. We have pizza on Thursday.
19.cn: 有问题吗？这是泰国菜。又来了。我们周四不吃泰国菜，我们吃批萨。
